}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module is used in the [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Pro+15-Inch+Unibody+Teardown/590/4 '''Apple''' MacBook Pro 15" Unibody (2009)].
*[https://applelife.ru/threads/zapuskaem-kombo-moduli-wi-fi-bluetooth-ot-apple-na-obychnom-kompjutere.39681/#post-361929 On '''applelife''' forums] [https://applelife.ru/threads/rebrending-devajsov.24468/page-4#post-358762 On '''Skvo''' posts] :Broadcom BCM4322 - vid:pid [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/14e4/432b 14e4:432b] :BCM94322USA - subsystems: 106b:008d :BCM94322MC - subsystems: 106b:008e :BCM94322HM8L
